name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Full Stack Developer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance web-based applications, specializing in **React.js** for frontend development and **AWS** for cloud-native systems. Proficient in implementing APIs, continuous integration, continuous deployment, and continuous delivery practices, while leveraging version control best practices.
Expertise in creating robust testing strategies and utilizing logging and monitoring tools to ensure application reliability. Demonstrated ability to adapt to new technologies, focusing on clean coding principles and effective problem-solving. Proven track record in the healthcare and financial industries, skilled in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, and backend technologies such as **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Additionally, experienced in building AI/ML-powered platforms, addressing compliance with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards, along with a strong foundation in MLOps utilizing **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
